Sentencas: A series of cathode materials of Pr 2-x Sr x NiO 4 (x = 0, 0.3, 0.5, 0.7, 1, 1.5) are synthesized by the EDTA-citric acid route.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of Sr doped Pr 2 NiO 4 cathode material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results show that the Pr 1.7 Sr 0.3 NiO 4 , Pr 1.5 Sr 0.5 NiO 4 , Pr 1.3 Sr 0.7 NiO 4 and PrSrNiO 4 exhibit excellent structural stability and carbon dioxide resistance, and also exhibit good chemical compatibility and thermal matching with the SDC electrolyte.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of Sr doped Pr 2 NiO 4 cathode material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is also found that the Sr doping is beneficial in improving the high temperature conductivity of Pr 2-x Sr x NiO 4 .
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of Sr doped Pr 2 NiO 4 cathode material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: At 800 degrees C, the electrical conductivity of Pr 1.5 Sr 0.5 NiO 4 and Pr 1.3 Sr 0.7 NiO 4 reaches 185 S cm - 1 and 317 S cm -1 , respectively.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of Sr doped Pr 2 NiO 4 cathode material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, the area-specific resistance (ASR) value increases significantly with Sr doping, which reduces the catalytic activity of the material.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of Sr doped Pr 2 NiO 4 cathode material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Acceptable ASR values are obtained for Pr 1.5 Sr 0.5 NiO 4 and Pr 1.3 Sr 0.7 NiO 4 , with ASR values of 0.079 Omega cm 2 and 0.082 Omega cm 2 at 800 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of Sr doped Pr 2 NiO 4 cathode material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Additionally, the most interesting result is the ASR value obtained after high-temperature thermal decomposition of Pr 2 NiO 4 , where Pr 2 NiO 4 * (decomposed) has the lowest ASR value of only 0.027 Omega cm 2 at 800 degrees C, showing the best catalytic activity.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of Sr doped Pr 2 NiO 4 cathode material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The maximum power densities of Pr 2-x Sr x NiO 4 (x = 0.5 and 0.7) and Pr 2 NiO 4 * are found to be 515, 430, and 548 mW cm -2 at 800 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of Sr doped Pr 2 NiO 4 cathode material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These results show that when the Sr doping amount is less than 1.5, the stability of the Pr 2-x Sr x NiO 4 cathode material can be effectively improved, but its catalytic performance is partially sacrificed.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of Sr doped Pr 2 NiO 4 cathode material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
